meanings.definition: To preserve the memory of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The photo album memorializes our family vacations.
meanings.sent2: The statue in the park memorializes the town's founder.
meanings.sent3: The old tree memorializes the time it was struck by lightning.
meanings.sent4: The song memorializes the struggles of the working class.
meanings.sent5: The plaque memorializes the sacrifices made by our ancestors.

meanings.definition: To commemorate or honor someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The museum exhibit memorializes the achievements of great scientists.
meanings.sent2: The annual ceremony memorializes the victims of the war.
meanings.sent3: The painting memorializes a cat wearing a crown.
meanings.sent4: The monument memorializes the spirit of unity in the community.
meanings.sent5: The documentary memorializes the history of jazz music.
